title: On a Cloudy Day
description: He was everything I didn't want,  She was everything I always needed. He bulldozed his way through, destroying the walls I put in place. She gave me the courage I needed to take the wheel and control my life. When we met in the clouds, we didn't know we'd fall in love. We just knew we needed to survive the storm,  While also chasing the sunset....From debut author Imani Lewis, comes a new contemporary romance novel about unforeseen friendships, love, and finding who you really are.
author: Imani  Lewis
